attributes.action: Close all schools and colleges to reduce the spread of COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: To protect staff, students and families and slow the spread of COVID-19 and the new variants.
attributes.background: Close all schools in tier 3 and 4, including Primary schools, to protect students, staff and their families, who may be vulnerable.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
